word: Many of the Protestant churches are following Rome's example of iniquitous connection with \93the kings of the earth;\94 the State churches, by their relation to secular governments, and other denominations by seeking the favor of the world. And the term Babylon\97confusion\97may be appropriately applied to these bodies, all professing to derive their doctrines from the Bible, yet divided into almost innumerable sects, with widely conflicting creeds and theories.
